scripts.postinstall: echo "All dependencies were installed sucessfully ✅ You can now run tests by typing: npm run test"
scripts.clean: echo "❌ Cleaning the reports and downloads folders"  && rimraf test-results/* && rimraf report/* && rimraf playwright-report/* && echo "✅ All reports folders cleaned!"
scripts.posttest: echo "⌚ Saving the allure report" && allure generate ./report/allure-results --single-file --clean -o ./report/allure-report && echo "⌚ Allure report saved in ./report/allure-report folder" && npm run merge-reports
scripts.posttest:history: echo "⌚ Creating the html page with parsed results and Saving the allure report" && mkdir ./report/allure-results/history && cp ./report/allure-report/history/* ./report/allure-results/history && allure generate ./report/allure-results -o ./report/allure-report --clean && echo "⌚ Allure report saved in allure-report folder"
scripts.format: echo Formatting the code ⌛ && prettier --write ./tests/**/*.ts && echo "✅ Code formatted, ready to commit!"
scripts.lint: echo Linting the code ⌛ && eslint ./**/*.ts ./*.ts --fix && echo "✅ Code linted, ready to commit!"
